title: The Lost Town of Deepwood, PA
itunes:title: The Lost Town of Deepwood, PA
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Some places are better left lost...

***

Written by CK Walker, guest narration by Molly Lankford

***

Please consider supporting the podcast at Patreon.com/Creepypod 

All month long for March 2019, new $5+ members get an exclusive sticker set and entry into a drawing for a Creepy Logo Hoodie! Sign up now!

***

SCP Archives on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/scp-archives/id1453436915?mt=2

***

SCP Archives on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/72aUDFGFu1acKQ6noDj7Fm

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin, Puzzle Audio

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
